definition: The name of the test for the drug accountability assessment.
name: Drug Accountability Test Name

terms.definition: The quantity of a product that has been dispensed. (NCI)
The quantity of a product that has been made ready for use.
The quantity of a product that remains after dosing, consumption, or use.
The quantity of a product that has been returned. (NCI)
